title: Small Group Exercise - Discuss the work that remains, how best to do the work, and any issues

quizDescription.text:
Purpose of the day
The purpose of this exercise is to help you and your work group to develop a clear picture of the work that remains, so you can invest your energies wisely.

attachment: 01 Small Group Exercise - Discuss the work that remains, how best to do the work, and any issues.pdf

questions.questionText: Summarize the Small Group Exercise - Discuss the work that remains, how best to do the work, and any issues
